features: 【Upgraded Air Volume 】Neck Fan new upgrade,360-degree surround type,the wind is increased by 70%,the three-speed wind is adjustable,the 60 turbine blades are strong and comfortable,and it can cool quickly in 3 seconds
【Safe & Portable】New Upgrade capacity 5200mAh,it can keep working for 4 to 16 hours.The charging time is short,no fan blades,silent design,and will not pinch hair.

【Comfortable & Skin-Friendly】Can fit the skin better,can effectively prevent sliding,flexible and not easy to break,cool and more comfortable,the charging port is simple and easy to use,and the unique design makes the left and right sides of the air flow evenly

【Elegant & Cool】Relax anytime,anywhere,the stylish style makes you look cool.Hanging on the neck,suitable for traveling in hot weather,save you from the embarrassment of dripping sweat suddenly in public in many places,it is your good assistant in summer
【Convenient & Practical】The portable fan is very suitable for personal cooling,offices,churches,outdoor activities,such as camping,traveling,hiking,climbing and watching sports games,etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love everything about this neck fan.
reviews.reviewText: WOW! its always hot at my work, it stays around my neck and keeps me cool. I get a ton of compliments on the design and how well it works. I could probably forward the link to at least 10 people today that would purchase this item. I dont have any dislikes to be honest. Its not loud, it keeps me cool, its sleek looking, its light, and it kept a chart so far for me for around 3 hours without having to recharge it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very powerful and long lasting.
reviews.reviewText: The neck fan really cools you down and very light weight. The charge is very long as well. Very dependable and low profile..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This works great for the purpose of cooling. It has multiple levels of cooling and becomes more noisy the higher the levels go. I have difficulty with the weight of it on my neck after awhile and it becomes uncomfortable for me after a certain point of wearing it due to my neck aching. Other than that, it really does work for cooling and is a lifesaver for me while watching kids sports in the hot summer sun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love Love Love!!!! works great and keeps you cool!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: it looks just like it looks in the pic, it takes 4 hours to charge, its kinda heavy, it has three fan speeds but the instructions say keep the charging port up and if u do that it does not work good at all like 1 star, but if you turn it uoside down it becomes 3 stars although i havnt used it outside yet. i wish i woulda bought one of the first ones i was looking at (that was water resistant with a long lasting battery) but i was in a rush and couldnt remember which one i liked best, and this one was an "amazon choice" so i figured it should be decent, but instructions said something about adjusting the fans by turning them but cant turn anything on this neck fan sooo..... yea overall i give it 2 stars because im afraid if i sweat it will break and its only effective inside on level 3 of 3 or high.the solid one works but if its hot its not all that and when your walking it just doesnt feel like its really blowing on you, if its hot outside.but the twisty on feels like your can angle it to get air to where youll feel it, i havent taken it for a walk yet.the big differences between the somid one and the twisty one is the weight and the breakability feeling. the twisty one doesnt feel like you are going to break it but the solid one does like if you try to twist it or shove it in a purse or backpack.but the twisty one which is just plyable on the back neck area is pretty decent. i do wish the air came out of the holes in the back neck area but hey its not too bad especially if you git a good deal on it.update: the first 1 they sent died litterally 1 month after i recieved it, it came in a box that said update but the fan didnt have their name on it, the second one rhey sent had their name on it and hasnt died Yet but its only been 2 weeks....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does its job fine but the battery and fans could be better
reviews.reviewText: I decided to buy order these at the last minute because my girlfriend and I were attending an outdoor sporting event. This was last month (June) in South Texas during an insane heat wave. The heat index that day was >110° so this was a perfect stress test. It did... ok. In the extreme heat I had to turn mine up to full speed to notice any meaningful cooling effect. This meant the unit getting pretty loud, but with all the hubbub around me nobody else said they could hear it. I personally didn't mind it, but I also have a fan constantly running in every room of my home purely for the ambient noise so I might be in the minority when it comes to the unit's noise not being annoying.Unfortunately, my unit ran out of battery before the event was over; I got maybe a little over two and a half hours on the highest setting (out of 3). My girlfriend had hers on the medium setting and hers lasted the entire 3-3.5 hours we were outside. I haven't experimented with it or anything but I'll bet it could go at least 6-7 hours on the lowest setting. The only problem is it barely feels like anything on low, so why bother?Thing is, this was like $20, and you really do get what you pay for. It did an ok job and I'll be glad to have it if I need to spend any more prolonged time outside during this miserable summer, but looking back I probably would've invested a little more on a more powerful unit. If Amazon had half stars I'd rate this a 3.5 but since I have to choose I'm gonna just give it a 3 because of the disappointing battery life.

reviews.reviewText: Very good for hot summer days! Quiet and powerful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Disney
reviews.reviewText: This neck fan effectively keeps me feeling fresh and cool throughout the day at the park. Its battery longevity is impressive, ensuring uninterrupted use. Additionally, its lightweight design and quiet operation enhance convenience and comfort.
Me encantó, ventila muy bien, es ligero y de buen material

I am using this fan daily. So much easier than looking around for a hand fan. It may annoy some as the fan obviously sits right below the ears and the constant noise can be annoying. I do wear hearing aids so if I take them out…. not as annoying. However anyone with normal hearing is not able to “just take out the hearing aids” BUT I am ok with it as the relief is worth it. Now I have had this for only a few weeks and so far I am very happy with it. I do charge it regularly as you have no idea how much charge is left in it as it just basically stops working when needs a full charge.
It didn't work property even for one month...one side fan stopped working...no warranty ....so now useless....dont have option to give 0 rating so giving 1........#Waste of Money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I brought it around April 2022, I keep it for summer use, now starting summer, I want to use it but out of work .
This personal fan is going to be fantastic, if we ever get summer weather here. The 3speed fan is great. I love that it recharges on my computer. I highly recommend it.
